name: Pedaal Duwer - #pd_overhaul
description: Along side our Community Vintage Bike Auction, Pedaal Duwer are opening up a unique overhaul service aimed at ALL Deal residents thinking their bike might be past it. Our overhaul service is UNIQUE and AFFORDABLE as includes DEEP CLEAN - NECESSARY REPAIRS - FULL SERVICE - HIGH POLISH - COLLECTION AND DELIVERY. To ensure our customers can budget appropriately we are launching the #pd_overhaul at a fixed Â£50 (any necessary part will be quoted and supplied at cost).
